hadiths.text: Narrated Imran ibn Husayn: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: There must be no shouting or leading another horse at one's side. Yahya added in his tradition: When racing for a wager

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْجَلَبِ عَلَى الْخَيْلِ فِي السِّبَاقِ
chapter.eng-name: Practicing Al-Jalab With Horses In Racing
